message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a slight raise. But if we don't reach an agreement soon, the money will start losing value for both of us!
Come on, Alice, I'm taking a bigger risk here with the inflation. Give me a break!
Look, Bob, inflation is hitting us both. Let's compromise, or we'll both end up with nothing!
I'm not backing down, inflation is killing me! Meet me in the middle, or I'll keep going!
Bob, we're both losing money with every round. We need to compromise. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but this is my final offer.
